resources.string: A long time ago in academy far, far away...

A young ninja developer was developing an android application with which he wanted to bring balance in the force. The Dark Side of the force wanted to stop him but they were too weak for him... he was the chosen one! The application has a variety of start wars heroes separated into two views: Dark Side and The Force heroes. The app also has about application info, and the possibility to create your own personal hero...
